name: Infinity Coaster
description:
A procedurally generated roller coaster game where the main point is not to puke! Built in a week by Ramsey Nasser, Joseph Parker, Tims Gardner, and Salomao Becker for #procjam 2015.

Infinity Coaster is written in clojure, via the arcadia Unity plugin.

two versions - Oculus Rift and normal display
